scripts.build: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.prestart: node -e "console.log('[Prestart] Node.js version:', process.version); console.log('[Prestart] Current directory:', process.cwd()); const fs = require('fs'); console.log('[Prestart] Server file exists:', fs.existsSync('./server/server.js')); console.log('[Prestart] Client build exists:', fs.existsSync('./client/dist/index.html'));"
scripts.build:debug: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client && ls -la client/dist/ || echo 'no dist'
